thread.title: Global stocks fall after Trump's tariff plan

title: Global stocks fall after Trump's tariff plan

organizations.name: reuters news agency | brand attribution guidelines | careers  reuters

text:
Global stocks fall after Trump's tariff plan   02:03 
The specter of a global trade war sent world stocks tumbling on Friday as global trading partners warned the US that its planned tariffs on steel and aluminum risk retaliation from other economies, and could endanger jobs.   
The specter of a global trade war sent world stocks tumbling on Friday as global trading partners warned the US that its planned tariffs on steel and aluminum risk retaliation from other economies, and could endanger jobs.  //reut.rs/2HX8x1X
